text: FIFA 08 is a 2007 association football simulation video game in Electronic Arts' FIFA series created by EA Canada and published by Electronic Arts. It was released for the Playstation 2, Playstation 3, Playstation Portable, Xbox 360, Wii, Nintendo DS and Microsoft Windows. title: FIFA 08
